tlyric:
[by:我愿意保护你不让你受伤]
[00:20.64]I can't tell which day
[00:24.40]
[00:24.75]You will come back
[00:26.59]
[00:26.87]Too much missing
[00:28.76]But pressing the clock to turn
[00:32.68]
[00:33.88]Like to be in the quiet of the night
[00:37.95]
[00:38.23]Fragmentary and unbearable
[00:41.06]
[00:41.37]Can be lonely and bold
[00:46.26]
[00:46.53]Too much concern
[00:49.59]The light is dazzling
[00:52.62]
[00:53.12]Before being completely depleted
[00:55.30]You appeared in front of me
[00:58.41]
[00:58.75]Just think of it as my hallucination. Slow down a bit
[01:04.19]
[01:04.93]If I miss you backwards
[01:07.43]Before that
[01:09.91]Can you replace me to choose
[01:13.57]
[01:13.97]How do you want the time to turn
[01:19.13]
[01:20.50]How to replace what I just missed
[01:26.57]
[01:26.90]I didn't expect to wake up missing a piece
[01:33.77]
[01:34.08]I've thought about forgetting
[01:35.65]It's the worst plan in the end
[01:39.83]
[01:40.62]be spotlessly clean
[01:43.58]
[01:44.70]So simple
[01:47.28]
[02:15.26]The photo paper you took shyly
[02:18.14]
[02:18.40]The first screen
[02:19.86]You made me touch this button
[02:21.33]
[02:21.65]It's the relaxed side
[02:23.08]
[02:23.35]Later on, it slowly disintegrated
[02:24.86]
[02:25.11]On the day of temporary separation
[02:26.26]
[02:26.59]Who could have thought that was us
[02:28.39]The last side between the two
[02:30.24]
[02:30.66]Before this
[02:32.39]
[02:32.68]Embracing so firmly
[02:34.30]Always by my side as I speak
[02:35.92]
[02:36.25]I said we wanted to see the sea together
[02:38.67]
[02:38.98]Now I'm waiting alone
[02:42.28]
[02:42.91]How do you want the time to turn
[02:47.62]
[02:48.49]How to replace what I just missed
[02:55.77]
[02:56.13]I didn't expect to wake up missing a piece
[03:02.20]
[03:02.53]I've thought about forgetting
[03:04.75]It's the worst plan in the end
[03:08.60]
[03:09.01]My weakness has become my failure
[03:11.72]
[03:12.68]I can't do it. I really don't care
[03:15.38]
[03:15.74]All I can do is every day
[03:18.08]Silent recitation
[03:19.51]
[03:19.78]Forgetting is the last and worst plan
[03:23.59]
[03:23.85]be spotlessly clean
[03:26.00]
[03:26.30]So simple
[03:29.61]
[03:31.62]Continuous weightlessness
[03:34.72]
[03:35.02]Until I lost control
[03:36.24]
[03:36.55]Without any reason
[03:39.46]
[03:40.18]You have already seen
[03:41.06]How could you believe what I said? I don't hurt
[03:44.71]
[03:45.00]How do you want the time to turn
[03:49.42]
[03:49.74]How to replace what I just missed
[03:55.97]
[03:56.71]I didn't expect to wake up missing a piece
[04:03.10]
[04:03.44]I've thought about forgetting
[04:05.38]It's the worst plan in the end
[04:10.53]
[04:10.87]be spotlessly clean
[04:13.49]
[04:14.03]So simple
